channel.title: Custom modicon for 1 player only? ***HELP writing a code
channel.description: Okay so I want to make it so that only a certain person has a custom icon next to their name. I already made the icon, I just need a code that would allow him to have that.

item.title: Custom modicon for 1 player only? ***HELP writing a code
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

pure2ownage:

you make it load a new icon.

That was unimaginably unhelpful. I’m trying to add a player right and make it load a new icon
OR
load a icon for someone without player rights, but only that person.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom modicon for 1 player only? ***HELP writing a code
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Well I’d have to add player rights… and thats harder to do, so I meant for 1 person. Unless you can tell me how to add player rights like 5 and 6 as coder and site coder or something.

Come on guys…its not even like its that difficult of a code. I’ve seen it on like 80 different servers…
I just want to add player right 5= coder or 6= site coder… =\

Read full topic
item.source: Custom modicon for 1 player only? ***HELP writing a code

item.title: Custom modicon for 1 player only? ***HELP writing a code
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

Are you saying for like 1 person or 1 rank. (like is it for the person with the playerRights of 2, or is it used for only a certain admin/mod and no other admin/mod?)

If it is for 1 rank, i suggest getting tom’s cache suit (located here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=417488.0) then just open it and go to the archives then overwrite the Mod icon or the Admin icon. That is it!

But if it is for only 1 person, then idk what to say… never had to done that srry.

Read full topic
